Package com.rutaji.exaqua.Energy

Class MyEnergyStorage

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.energy.EnergyStorage
com.rutaji.exaqua.Energy.MyEnergyStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.Capability.IStorage<mekanism.api.energy.IEnergyContainer>, net.minecraftforge.energy.IEnergyStorage
public class MyEnergyStorage extends net.minecraftforge.energy.EnergyStorage implements net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.Capability.IStorage<mekanism.api.energy.IEnergyContainer>
Stores energy in tile entities. These tile entities implement IMYEnergyStorageTile.

  • Field Details

    • OnChange

      public MyDelegate OnChange
      Delegate run every time stored energy changes. Used to send changes from server to client.

  • Method Details

    • TryDrainEnergy

      public boolean TryDrainEnergy(int energy)
      Drains energy, but only if there is enough. Returns true if the energy was drain. If there wasn't enough energy nothing is drained and returns false. Always return True if server config RequireElectricity is False.
      Parameters:
      energy - amount of energy to be drained in FE
      Returns:
      true if energy was drained. False if no energy was drain.

    • HasEnoughEnergy

      public boolean HasEnoughEnergy(int energyAmounth)
      Returns:
      true if stored energy is higher or same as given parametr.

    • canReceive

      public boolean canReceive()
      Specified by:
      canReceive in interface net.minecraftforge.energy.IEnergyStorage
      Overrides:
      canReceive in class net.minecraftforge.energy.EnergyStorage
      Returns:
      true, if storage can receive energy.

    • IsFull

      public boolean IsFull()
      Returns:
      true if storage is full.

    • setEnergy

      public void setEnergy(int energy)
      Sets stored energy to given number.

    • OnContentChanged

      public void OnContentChanged()
      Called every time stored energy changes by setEnergy. Executes OnChange to send change to a client.

    • getCapabilityProvider

      public net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider getCapabilityProvider()
      Returns EnergyStorageAdapter that translates this class into simple IEnergyStorage from Forge. Used for comunication with other mods.
      Returns:
      EnergyStorageAdapter wrapped around this energy storage.

    • receiveEnergy

      public int receiveEnergy(int maxReceive, boolean simulate)
      Adds energy to the storage. Returns quantity of energy that was accepted.
      Specified by:
      receiveEnergy in interface net.minecraftforge.energy.IEnergyStorage
      Overrides:
      receiveEnergy in class net.minecraftforge.energy.EnergyStorage
      Parameters:
      maxReceive - Maximum amount of energy to be inserted.
      simulate - If TRUE, the insertion will only be simulated.
      Returns:
      Amount of energy that was (or would have been, if simulated) accepted by the storage.

    • extractEnergy

      public int extractEnergy(int maxExtract, boolean simulate)
      Removes energy from the storage. Returns quantity of energy that was removed.
      Specified by:
      extractEnergy in interface net.minecraftforge.energy.IEnergyStorage
      Overrides:
      extractEnergy in class net.minecraftforge.energy.EnergyStorage
      Parameters:
      maxExtract - Maximum amount of energy to be extracted.
      simulate - If TRUE, the extraction will only be simulated.
      Returns:
      Amount of energy that was (or would have been, if simulated) extracted from the storage.
